title: Loading Data Into A Data Frame
---

# Introduction

My article is about identifying a rising trend in police misconduct payouts across the United States.

[Cities Spend Millions On Police Misconduct Every Year. Here’s Why It’s So Difficult to Hold Departments Accountable.
](https://fivethirtyeight.com/features/police-misconduct-costs-cities-millions-every-year-but-thats-where-the-accountability-ends/)

```{r}
library("dplyr")
```

```{r}
chicagoMisconductPayouts <- read.csv(file = 'chicago_edited.csv')
head(chicagoMisconductPayouts)
```

```{r}
payoutsWithYear <- subset(chicagoMisconductPayouts, select = c("calendar_year", "amount_awarded"))
head(payoutsWithYear)
```

```{r}
payoutsWithYear %>%
  group_by(calendar_year) %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(amount_awarded), n = n())
```
